page.title: 07Lower Swansea Valley
page.content: In the Lower Swansea Valley there have been a lot of changes.A{hotel}and lake have been built. To achieve this they cleared away all the old slag heaps and the ruins of the old metal works. They have also cleaned out the pond and stocked it with fish. Down in the valley they have built a{sports {stadium}with a fine grandstand and indoor training facilities. It is called the Morfa Stadium after one of the old copper works. People using the stadium has caused so much extra traffic that a{new bridge}is needed over the River Tawe.
